user.title: Connect to Strawberry Hub
user.description: Enter your Strawberry Hub URL and device token to connect.

data_description.hub_url: The URL of your Strawberry Hub (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:8000)
data_description.hub_token: JWT device token from Hub device registration

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Strawberry Hub. Check the URL and ensure the Hub is running.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Check your device token.

data_description.prompt: Custom instructions for the AI. Supports Home Assistant templates.
data_description.llm_hass_api: Allow the AI to control exposed Home Assistant entities.
data_description.offline_backend: Backend used for offline mode: Auto prefers TensorZero when installed; OpenAI-compatible uses direct provider APIs.
data_description.tensorzero_function_name: TensorZero function name to invoke (for example: chat).
data_description.offline_provider: Primary LLM provider to use when the Hub is unreachable.
data_description.offline_fallback_providers: Ordered fallback providers to try if the primary provider fails.
data_description.offline_api_key: Legacy shared API key used if provider-specific keys are not set.
data_description.offline_model: Legacy shared model used if provider-specific models are not set.
data_description.offline_openai_api_key: API key used when OpenAI is selected in the offline chain.
data_description.offline_google_api_key: API key used when Google is selected in the offline chain.
data_description.offline_anthropic_api_key: API key used when Anthropic is selected in the offline chain.
data_description.ollama_url: URL for local Ollama OpenAI-compatible endpoint.
